patch: \c[10]Radio\c[0]:\s[1] WHAT are you trying to do?!\.
Are you trying to take the objective from
Korzojeno?!\. Single-handedly?!
I'm not going to take it
or conquer it.
\c[1]Seldan\c[0]:\s[1] I will DESTROY it!
\c[10]Radio\c[0]:\s[1] ...You... YOU'RE INSANE!
\c[1]Seldan\c[0]:\s[1] I don't see any other way.
\c[10]Radio\c[0]:\s[1] You... YOU...\. YOU CAN'T DO THAT!!\. WE NEED
IT!!\. THIS WHOLE WAR WAS CREATED IN ORDER TO SEIZE
CONTROL OF IT!!\. WHAT THE HELL DO YOU THINK YOU'RE
DOING?!\. STOP THIS NOW!!
(\c[1]Seldan\c[0]:\s[2] Why do I even bother trying
to talk to you...)
(\c[1]Seldan\c[0]:\s[1] Now!\. According to the
information, I have to take a left
and go down the hall to get to
the objective...)
\c[10]Radio\c[0]:\s[2] If the Zojenish get a hold of the
Vel-System, it's the end for Brigantia!
\c[1]Seldan\c[0]:\s[2] I have no intention of
backstabbing my country,\. don't worry...\.
I will never let this technology fall
into their blood-stained hands!
\c[10]Radio\c[0]:\s[2] How can you say that?!\.
Look at what you're doing!
\c[10]Zojenish Soldier\c[0]:\s[2] There he is! Get him!
(\c[1]Seldan\c[0]: I have to go down the
other hallway...)
(\c[1]Seldan\c[0]: I have to go down the
other hallway...)
(\c[1]Seldan\c[0]: I have to go down the
other hallway...)
